trends: There have been no other sightings in Hull
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was checking out the stars looking for satellites when i saw a sphere just reflecting light then disappearing .Then about 5 min later a bright flash of light shone like a star in the same section of sky where 2 other bright stars are .At first i thought it was a third star and unfortunately i am not an avid star gazer so i did not recognize them but the third star started moving ,it got real bright then the light went out and i could still see its shadow moving across the sky as it disappeared. Total time of the second event was maybe 10 seconds. First about 5 seconds.
